name: Agent Squire

name: Ap Tul
body: A growing library of privacy-focused developer tools. Simplify your workflow with secure, browser-based utilities like our high-performance Image Converter and Resizer.

Job Search resources and tips.

body: A portal site for the Gassler family.

body: Resources and tips for independent game developers.

name: My Fidelity
body: Developer portal for accessing and managing My Fidelity API tools and content delivery services offered by Stoic Dreams.

name: Pocket Goo
body: Blog and resources for handheld and pocket sized gadgets.

name: Software Engineering Standards & Practices
body:
Documentation for software engineering standards and practices for building software through agile development and continuous delivery workflows.

These standards are more specifically targeted from a company/management perspective.

name: Software Engineer Standards
body: Personal standards for software engineers to maximize productivity.

name: Software Development Standards
body:
Documentation for software development standards for building software through agile development and continuous delivery workflows.

These standards are generally targeted from a developer/team perspective.

name: Stoic Dreams
body: Stoic Dreams' company portal.

name: Task Proxy
body: Task Proxy is our desktop application that is being designed to allow developers to manage code documenation and scripts, speed up workflows, and simplify collaboration with other developers.

name: Task Story
body: Task Story is our Project Management tool that provides a guided workflow to organize projects with a Problem / Solution architecture.

name: Vocal Bin
body: Text to speech synthesis tools and resources.

name: Wax Loop
body: Social network for sharing and discovery.
